arStrings.szText: {c_important}Decompose{/c} now causes a small explosion dealing {c_number}{payload:BURST}{/c} damage when creating a Corpse or when the enemy dies, and you gain {c_number}{SF_7}{/c} Essence.
Explosions from {c_important}Decompose{/c} make enemies {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} for {c_number}{SF_12}{/c} seconds.

{c_important}Decompose{/c} Slows enemies by {c_number}[{SF_13} * 100|%|]{/c}. When {c_important}Decompose{/c} explodes, you gain {c_number}[SF_22 * 100|%+|]{/c} Movement Speed for {c_number}{SF_23}{/c} seconds.
